comment1: It's bizzare but it works! Great animation and awesome experience.
comment2: The eerie vibes I get while watching were real good, worth checking out if you like psych horror!
comment3: A wonderfully crafted tragedy, the ending segment sent chills down my spine, the pace is rather slow and it's rather violent though, be warned.
summary: Can't say I watched that many entries from this year, this was before I was born!
